item.title: Testing Rmarkdown with GNIP data
item.description: Viewing data I’ve downloaded a small set of data from the International Atomic Energy Agency Global Network for Isotopes in Precipitation that includes water isotope data collected in the last 10 years from 14 sites around the world. With this data source, I can’t pull directly, but I can convert and load a .csv. The code chunk that produces this table also cleans up the data for display.
